title: Avenlee's Artwoetry
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt
themesetting=a|
darkmode=a]]

[[div class="notation"]]
[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
Hello there fellow researcher, welcome to my artwoetry page!

What's artwoetry?

Well, it's just a weird combination of artworks and poetry, you know, I like to experiment with stuff.

You might recognise me from my previous works.

No?

Anyways, I'm [[*user Dr Avenlee]],

This page contains some of my art+poetry abominations.

[[collapsible show="Previous works" hide="Close"]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:dr-avenlee-s-artchives Dr. Avenlee's Artchives]
[https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/the-wanderers-gallery The Wanderers' Gallery]
[https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/the-strange-box Dr. Avenlee's Archives]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:file:princess-cassandra Dr. Avenlee's Visual Archives Contest entry]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:memetic-killagent-archive Memetic Kill Agent Archive]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:scp-animation-archives SCP Animation Archives]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:error66-r7-3-m155 Error66-@rt-E-Miss]
[http://backrooms-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-avenlee "THE VOID"]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:scip-comics SCiP Comics]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]

[[/div]]
